mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM user_info WHERE user_name = #{userName}

SELECT deposit_id, deposit_info.user_id, deposit_year, deposit_month, deposit_day, deposit_amount, deposit_method_id, deposit_category_id, deposit_detail FROM deposit_info LEFT JOIN method_info ON deposit_info.deposit_method_id = method_info.method_id LEFT JOIN category_info ON deposit_info.deposit_category_id = category_info.category_id WHERE deposit_info.user_id = #{userId} AND (deposit_year = #{year} AND deposit_month = #{month}) ORDER BY deposit_day;

SELECT spending_id, spending_info.user_id, spending_year, spending_month, spending_day, spending_amount, spending_method_id, spending_category_id, spending_detail FROM spending_info LEFT JOIN method_info ON spending_info.spending_method_id = method_info.method_id LEFT JOIN category_info ON spending_info.spending_category_id = category_info.category_id WHERE spending_info.user_id = #{userId} AND (spending_year = #{year} AND spending_month = #{month}) ORDER BY spending_day;
SELECT method_name FROM method_info WHERE method_id = #{methodId}
SELECT category_name FROM category_info WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT deposit_id, deposit_info.user_id, deposit_year, deposit_month, deposit_day, deposit_amount, deposit_method_id, deposit_category_id, deposit_detail FROM deposit_info WHERE deposit_id = #{depositId}

SELECT spending_id, spending_info.user_id, spending_year, spending_month, spending_day, spending_amount, spending_method_id, spending_category_id, spending_detail FROM spending_info WHERE spending_id = #{spendingId}

SELECT category_info.category_name, deposit_amount FROM deposit_info LEFT JOIN category_info ON deposit_info.deposit_category_id = category_info.category_id WHERE deposit_info.user_id = #{userId} AND deposit_year = #{year} AND deposit_month = #{month}

SELECT category_info.category_name, SUM(deposit_amount) FROM deposit_info LEFT JOIN category_info ON deposit_info.deposit_category_id = category_info.category_id WHERE deposit_info.user_id = #{userId} AND deposit_year = #{year} AND deposit_month = #{month} GROUP BY category_info.category_name
